name: The Wake Of AI
description:
If you find the game Enjoyable, you may want to download the game, it would play smoother, the web version is just for a try, there may or may not be bugs that could effect gameplay. Thank you

CONTROLS

"A" to go left

"D" to go right

"Space" to jump / "W" to use your RocketPack

Collect the "Energy Cell to power your RocketPack

Don't forget to Conserve fuel!

"left mouse button" to perform stab attack

"Q" to Throw your weapon to the direction of your mouse pointer 

go to the Telepod to go to the next room

ESC to show pause menu
